p: Compound 6d was prepared from benzo[ b]thiophene-2-carbaldehyde 4e (0.054 g, 0.33 mmol), 2–(3,4-diaminophenyl)-3,4,5,6-tetrahydropyrimidin-1-ium chloride 3 (0.075 g, 0.33 mmol), and sodium metabisulfite (0.063 g, 0.33 mmol) in dimethyl sulfoxide (0.6 ml). The resulting free base was converted into salt as described below to obtained 0.053 g (43.1%) of beige powder; m.p. >300 °C; 1H NMR (600 MHz, DMSO- d 6) δ 10.16 (s, 2H), 8.23 (s, 2H), 8.00 (s, 1H), 8.00 (d, J = 6.6 Hz, 1H), 7.91 (d, J = 6.8 Hz, 1H), 7.65 (d, J = 8.3 Hz, 1H), 7.47 (d, J = 8.1 Hz, 1H), 7.43 − 7.36 (m, 2H), 3.51 (t, J = 5.3 Hz, 4H), 1.99 (m, 2H); 13 C NMR (75 MHz, DMF- d 7) δ 160.7, 140.8, 140.6, 126.0, 125.6, 125.0, 123.4, 120.5, 116.3, 39.8, 19.1; Analysis calcd for C 19H 17ClN 4S: C, 61.86; H, 4.65; N, 15.19%; Found: C, 61.88; H, 4.62; N, 15.21%.
